document.text:
From: 
To: 
Bee: 
Subject: 
Date: Monday, December 16, 2019 7:02:00 PM 
Dear 
M, 
Please excuse the informality but I am an old experienced civil trial attorney. Luckily, 
I never have represented any client in criminal matters. 
just contacted my office and said that you dropped by her apartment. She was a former 
client. She would like to cooperate but I have my professional responsibility to make some inquiry 
about events that were so long ago. 
Regarding the Epstein matter she is definitely a victim and I hope that you are aware of this fact. 
That being said is she a target in any ongoing investigation? 
Let me know and we can figure a good time to meet and potentially whether or not I am competent 
to represent her. 
Thank you, 
9150 Wilshire Blvd., Suite 241 
Beverly Hills, California 90212-3429 
CONFIDENTIALITY 
This e-mail is for the personal and exclusive use of the recipient(s) named above. It contains confidential information frost 
Its contents are not only to remain absolutely confidential, but may also be subject to the attorney-client pdvilege or coverage under the work-product 
doctrine. If you have received this transmission and are not the intended recipient(s) or his/her agent, please be advised that any disclosure, use, 
review, copying, selling, dissemination, publication, or distribution of this transmission is strictly unauthorized and prohibited. If you have received this 
transmission in error, please notify the sender at the number above, return the orignal e-mail by mail, and delete the e-mail file from your computer. 
EFTA00029197

Postage is guaranteed. Your cooperation is appreciated. thank you. 
EFTA00029198
